name: collections::vec_deque::spec_extend::prepend

collections::vec_deque::VecDeque::<T, A>.doc:
Returns the index in the underlying buffer for a given logical element
 index - subtrahend.

Copies all values from `src` to `dst`, wrapping around if needed.
 Assumes capacity is sufficient.

doc:
# Safety

 Elements of `slice` will be copied into the deque, make sure to forget the items if `T` is not `Copy`.
